title: Show a better error page during outages or maintenance
body_html:
Heroku gives you the possibility to create custom error and maintenance pages. While I've never done that, maybe we could look into doing it? With the recent AWS outage, the site was down for a while and showed a page that was not particularly informative. We also got a tweet suggesting a better / more informative page.
I don't think this is particularly pressing, but does anyone see value in doing it? Would love for everyone's thoughts on this.

body:
Heroku gives you [the possibility](https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/error-pages#customize-pages) to create custom error and maintenance pages. While I've never done that, maybe we could look into doing it? With the recent AWS outage, the site was down for a while and showed a page that was not particularly informative. We also [got a tweet](https://twitter.com/untitaker/status/836696176657330182) suggesting a better / more informative page.
I don't think this is particularly pressing, but does anyone see value in doing it? Would love for everyone's thoughts on this.
